attributes.action: To assess the standard of teaching and learning in PE within the primary sector.
attributes.background: With childhood obesity at a all time high in the UK I feel that PE within Primary schools needs to improve. PE is a subject that is not taken seriously enough within schools. Teachers do not prioritise PE as other subjects are deemed more important. Instead schools hire level 2 "sports coaches".

rejection.details:
Ofsted, not the UK Parliament and Government, are responsible for assessing teaching and learning in schools. 

You could start a new petition about something the UK Parliament and Government are responsible for. For example, you could start a new petition asking the UK Government and Parliament to investigate whether changes need to be made to PE in schools to tackle childhood obesity. 

You might also like to sign and share this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/255414
